name: newsmarkaba
description: A modern, bilingual (Arabic/English) news website built with Next.js, Node.js, and PostgreSQL

scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.clean: npm run clean:client && npm run clean:server
scripts.lint: npm run lint:client && npm run lint:server
scripts.test: npm run test:client && npm run test:server
scripts.db:reset: dropdb newsmarkaba && createdb newsmarkaba && npm run db:setup
scripts.deploy:help: echo "Usage: npm run update-domain <domain> [server_port] [client_port] [protocol]" && echo "Example: npm run update-domain newsmarkaba.com 5001 443 https"

author: NewsMarkaba Team
